mapper.select: SELECT s.ID id, CONCAT(s.MATTERS_NO, '/', s.MATTERS_NAME) mattersInfo, s.MATTERS_NO mattersNo, CONCAT(s.NORMS, '/', s.PARAM, '/', s.MODEL_DESC) allInfo, s.UNIT unit, s.WEIGHT weight, t.type_name typeName, prod_bom_detail_plm.amount, prod_bom_detail_plm.plm_desc plmDesc, prod_bom_detail_plm.backup_matter backUpMatterNo, CONCAT(backMatter.MATTERS_NO, '/', backMatter.MATTERS_NAME) backMattersInfo FROM prod_bom_detail_plm INNER JOIN MATTERS_STORE_IOS s ON prod_bom_detail_plm.matters_no = s.matters_no AND s.deleted = 'F' AND s.company_id = #{companyId} INNER JOIN matters_type_ios t ON s.TYPE_ID = t.id AND t.deleted = 'F' AND t.company_id = #{companyId} INNER JOIN matters_store_ios AS backMatter ON prod_bom_detail_plm.backup_matter = backMatter.matters_no AND backMatter.deleted = 'F' AND s.company_id = #{companyId} WHERE prod_bom_detail_plm.id = #{id} AND prod_bom_detail_plm.company_id = #{companyId} AND prod_bom_detail_plm.deleted = 'F'
